name: lv2
description: Portable plugin standard for audio systems
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab. Using deps.dev for cross-forge analysis.

readme.summary: Clear high-level description and installation pointers, but lacks practical usage examples and troubleshooting guidance.
readme.top_issue: No quick start or usage examples showing how to actually use LV2 plugins or develop with the API

common_complaints: Build system issues and compilation failures
Missing standard features compared to competing formats (CLAP, VST3)
Lack of version detection in headers
Validation tool issues with edge cases
sentiment.summary: LV2 shows signs of aging infrastructure with slow maintainer responsiveness, accumulating feature requests vs competing formats, and several unresolved issues spanning 5+ years.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite active issue tracking
13 open issues with no recent closures (0 closed in 6 months)
No merged pull requests in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests no versioning activity
positive_signals: Issues are being tracked and remain open (not abandoned entirely)
Recent commit activity exists (2026-01-08), though outside 6-month window
maintenance.summary: The lv2 package shows signs of stagnation with no development activity, issue resolution, or releases in the past 6 months, despite having open issues that remain unaddressed.
